item.title: Investment Services Firm Offering Anonymity and Security
item.description:
Investment Services Firm Offering Anonymity and Security

The new investment firm AnonInvest has officially been launched, and its unique integration of revolutionary technology will offer a fundamentally different mode of investment. AnonInvest utilises trusted and long-established investment strategies coupled with newer, innovative strategies which utilise peer-to-peer networks to facilitate trade and accessibility.

item.title: Why OpenBazaar Is Not Your Average Bitcoin Marketplace
item.description:
Why OpenBazaar Is Not Your Average Bitcoin Marketplace

Although there is a lot of competition in the world of online marketplaces, OpenBazaar feels they will have a leg up over their competitors. OpenBazaar is one of those projects Bitcoin and blockchain enthusiasts have been looking forward to for quite a long time.

item.title: Proof of Individuality, the New-Age Security on Blockchain - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Proof of Individuality, the New-Age Security on Blockchain - NEWSBTC

Proof of Individuality protocol is designed to prevent Sybil attacks on peer-to-peer network based computer reputation systems. Read more... The virtual world is full of threats; Sybil attacks make a sizeable chunk of it. Especially with the increasing implementation and usage of peer-to-peer networks, the network infrastructure lies more exposed to such attacks than ever.

item.title: BITCOIN NEWS, PRICE & ANALYSIS - NEWSBTC.COM
item.description:
BITCOIN NEWS, PRICE & ANALYSIS - NEWSBTC.COM

NewsBTC is a Bitcoin news service that covers cryptocurrency news, technical analysis and forecasts for bitcoin, litecoin, dash, doge & digital currencies.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Live Trade! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Live Trade! - NEWSBTC

Here's what's on in the bitcoin price for tonight's European evening session, and a look at a live trade we are tracking. Just as we dud this morning, let's kick off this evening's analysis with a chart.

item.title: The Future of Bitcoin is Bright According to XML Gold CEO
item.description:
The Future of Bitcoin is Bright According to XML Gold CEO

Bitcoin Press Release: Amid the Bitcoin block-size debate Bitcoin exchange platform XML Gold CEO believes new decentralized apps will be built on Bitcoin's blockchain, the current debate will be resolved, and the Internet will get its first real payment protocol.

item.title: CoinsBank Launches Universal Crypto Solution at Money2020 Europe
item.description:
CoinsBank Launches Universal Crypto Solution at Money2020 Europe

5Th April 2016, Copenhagen - The leading blockchain and cryptocurrency solutions provider, CoinsBank is creating a confluence of both traditional and cryptocurrency ecosystems with its latest Universal Crypto Solution at Money2020 Europe starting 4th of April. The four-day event will witness a series of announcements from CoinsBank.

item.title: New Cryptocurrency, BigUp Gets Bigger - NEWSBTC
item.description:
New Cryptocurrency, BigUp Gets Bigger - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin Press Release: The BigUp cryptocurrency is rapidly achieving recognition and popularity as it progresses with its development and integration phase with BigUp community's support. 05 April, 2016 - BigUp is a relatively new cryptocurrency that has made rapid progress in terms of user adoption and community contributions towards its development.

item.title: First Global Credit invites Competitors to vie for Four Live Trading Account Prizes
item.description:
First Global Credit invites Competitors to vie for Four Live Trading Account Prizes

First Global Credit, is now offering 4 Chances to Win a live account capable of trading. The company is offering up to 20 BTC of stock or at least 4 BTC of futures to start. First Global Credit is a company that lets Bitcoin holders use their bitcoins has collateral to trade stocks and ETFs.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/06/2016 - Nearing Channel Resistance - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/06/2016 - Nearing Channel Resistance - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price might encounter near-term resistance at the top of the rising channel but the overall uptrend remains intact. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price might encounter near-term resistance at the top of the rising channel but the overall uptrend remains intact.
